General.Name: Al Sagr Co-operative Insurance Co
General.Description: Al Sagr Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products and solutions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Singapore. The company operates through Medical, Motor, Property and Casualty, and Protection and Savings segments. It offers fire, property all risks, electronic data processing, deterioration of stock, and business interruption insurance products; marine cargo and hull insurance products; and engineering insurance products comprising contractor's all risks and erection all risks, contractors' plant and machinery, machinery breakdown, loss of profit due to machinery breakdown, boiler and pressure vessels, deterioration of stock, and electronics equipment insurance. The company also provides liability insurance products, such as workmen's compensation, employer liability, public liability, and professional indemnity insurance; onshore and offshore energy insurance products; and medical, travel, and medical malpractice insurance products. In addition, it offers miscellaneous insurance products, including personal accident, money, fidelity guarantee, and burglary insurance. Al Sagr Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 1983 and is based in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Abdul Rahman Al Turki Building, Dammam, Saudi Arabia
